entry.title: Tachyons
entry.content:
Tachyons is a small, readable css toolkit that packs a huge amount of functionality into a tiny framework. Check it out!

https://tachyons.io/
entry.summary: Tachyons is a small, readable css toolkit that packs a huge amount of functionality into a tiny framework. Check it out!

entry.title: Sloth - A GUI for lsof
entry.content:
“Sloth is a Mac application that displays all open files and sockets in use by all running processes on your system. This makes it easy to inspect which apps are using which files and sockets.”

Sloth is a usable GUI for lsof.

You can install with brew cask install sloth.

Or download from the github page. Sloth is open source. Check it out!
entry.summary: “Sloth is a Mac application that displays all open files and sockets in use by all running processes on your system. This makes it easy to inspect which apps are using which files and sockets.”
